title: Personal Portfolio v2
description: Newest version of my personal porftolio deployed on Vercel
supportText: Simple portfolio developed with Next.js in its latest version using the app directory, you can see the evolution in design with respect to my first projects.

title: Desahógate (Unburden Yourself)
description: Created with Next.js, MongoDB and NextAuth, it is a web app where we can see and filter posts created by people who need to get things off their chests.
supportText: With light/dark mode, if we click on a post we can send messages of encouragement and chat with the creator of the post and anyone who is in the chat at that moment.    Registration is required to post and comment.

title: Job search app
description: Developed with MERN stack and Socket.io. Users will receive an email when the status of their application changes and can also chat with the recruiter via live chat
supportText: Apart from the business logic, I've created a REST API with NodeJS, MongoDB, Express and Mongoose to store the data of users, companies and offers. Both candidates and companies have their credentials encoded using JWT.

title: Personal Portfolio v1
supportText: Simple SPA build with React as a bootcamp project learning how to use props and hooks, aswell as UX/UI practice.

title: PokéAPI
description: Front-end project, fetching the Pokémon API. Also included is the Whack-a-mole game made with Vanilla Javascript.
